body_html: After a quick try this actually only happens with openmpi 1.10. openmpi 2.1.1 and 3.0.0 both work fine for me. I'm taking a deeper look, but this is possible a openmpi problem. To verify, @matthiasreisser could you let us know which openmpi version are you using, and if it works for you when switching to a version I mentioned above? Thanks!
